attributes.action: Stop the smoking and vaping bill from coming into effect
attributes.additional_details: Because it is a choice to smoke and it is not up to the government what people do to their bodies especially since tobbaco and vaping does not cause dangerous behaviour in anyone unlike actual drugs.
attributes.background: This was recently announced and it’s all good to stop people under 18 to not smoke but anyone above 18 should be allowed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647395
